channel.title: New Site Idea - Free Sub Domains, Free Email
channel.description:
Ok, i have a new site currently under construction.
[quote="moparisthebest"][quote author=sup000 link=action=profile;u=106 date=1161789260] site advertisment request:
www.everything-known.com
new site idea, please review the concept and approve if you are ok with me posting about this here :) [/quote]
Thats a very interesting idea, I hope it turns out good for you. You can advertise it here.
Are you 'rival' on that forum?[/quote]
Basically the site will offer FREE SUB DOMAINS (SubZones :P) and FREE EMAIL ACCOUNTS - crazy? i think not!
You must [i]sell[/i] you idea to the community, ideas can be along any line and of any topic. I am looking to build a site containing the best possible information that people are genuinely interested in.
Its like an open source Wiki if you would like, just the initial selection of SubZones and topics will be [b]presented[/b] by you, then approved by everyone. It can be anything from Web Blogs to Forums to information pages, you decide!
Please take sometime to understand what the site is aiming for, you input will be greatly appreciated.
www.everything-known.com

item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

It’s going pretty well so far. It just needs more members to really kick off.

Read full topic

His site is listed in the general section, under current SubZones

item.title: New Site Idea - Free Sub Domains, Free Email
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

if you could keep an acitve SubZone, which only revolved around you, it would probably be accepted.

I am looking for constantly updated content, if you think you can draw people with information about you, i am not going to stop you!

sex is not off limits, but it must be original ideas. I will not just post random porn images on a subdomain. This is not my goal.

Read full topic

item.title: New Site Idea - Free Sub Domains, Free Email
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

its really just an experiment to see how it goes. I have no desired outcome of the project yet, just ideas. I will not try and shape the site in anyway. I am personally paying hosting, and have no issue with this at present. Ads may be added one day to help suipport if required but i dont see them becomming necessacary at the moment.

Dissapointing to see no signups or requests

edit : just two now

Read full topic
